descriptions:
['DescriptionLa Rosa by Dubai Holdings is a plush residential project located at Villanova in Dubai. Dubai Holdings is a
reputed realty company in Dubai. These exceptionally beautiful villas are located in a serene area which is
close to the city and it is just the mirror image of the beautiful Mediterranean lifestyle. It is just like a small
town within a city. A lovely place to be at.
What are the key Details of the project?
You can opt for either 3 bedroom or 4 bedroom villas as a wide variety is available to choose from. The villas
are well-equipped with world-class modern specifications to make you fall head over heels in love with these
alluring houses.
What are the amenities available here?
The range of amenities will surprise you as you will get almost everything modern and chic. The gated
community provides security always. Lovely parks with perfect jogging tracks. A shopping centre to suffice
your daily household needs. A huge play area for children, help them grow better, let them play. A community
swimming pool where you can enjoy your leisure time. Well-equipped gymnasium to keep you in great shape.
Beautifully landscaped gardens with paved compounds and car parking areas.
Advantage of the location
Location wise this place earns an extra brownie point because it is strategically located in near the junction of
Emirates Road and Al Ain road. It takes 7 minutes to reach the Global village from this place. Within 15
minutes you will reach Dubai airport, just 18 minutes to Business Bay. It takes just 15 minutes to Down Town
Dubai. This place is also close to well-known schools, colleges, hospitals, recreational areas, etc.
USPs of the project:
Community swimming pool
Gymnasium
Parks landscaped gardens and paved compounds
Car parking areas
Play area for children
Townhouse Size – 1947.
Townhouse Price – 1277900.
For more details, feel free to call us the earliest.']

["DescriptionThis is an incredible flat in a prime marina location at Dubai Marina, that hits the spot with its trendy design, practically-sized 1,233 sq.ft. floorplan, and unsurpassed partial yacht harbour view that is going to catch your gaze.
All the amenities you'll need are close to you. Proximity to the water taxi station and the metro station makes access to the property easy. There's a toddler-friendly children's pool and a tantalisingly cool infinity-edged pool for enjoying a dip on a blazing summer day. You'll have a gym, a children's playground, a jogging track close by, and a beach within a walking distance for your sport and fitness activities.
It benefits from 2 master bedrooms, a characterful living room, a chic horseshoe spacious kitchen, and a peaceful balcony that's fantastic for kicking back after a long day.

- Biggest layout

- Big balcony

- Floor to Ceiling windows

['Description• Discounted price for 100% payment
 • Exclusive listing
 • Option of 5 Yr POST HANDOVER PAYMENT PLAN
 • 5 YEARS NO SERVICE CHARGE
 • New Villa 2019
 • Rented AED170K - 1 Chq
 • Single Row Villa
 • 5 BED 3,383 SQ FT BUA
 • 4,698 SQ FT LANDSCAPED PLOT
 • Call Abdulsalam (Arabic & English) +971523005717
Dacha Real Estate is pleased to offer this EXCLUSIVE single row detached 5 bed villa located within Casa - a gated community within Arabian Ranches 2. The villa is offered with an option to buy with an interest free 5 Yr payment plan
Casa is a very mature green community which is occupied. Only minutes walk to Arabian Ranches Souk where you will find retail outlets, Gymnasium & quality Eateries.
An excellent opportunity to own your own home & take advantage of the discounted price 
OR
You can pay the original price AED 4,356,888 & spread your payments over FIVE Years afte. There are no service charges for FIVE years.
 A large Lounge & Dining Room, an equipped Kitchen & a Ground Floor Guest Bedroom with an Ensuite Bathroom. A Maid’s room and a separate entrance from the Garage and another out to the large Garden.
1st Floor is where the remaining 4 bedrooms with the master enjoying a walk in wardrobe and a large Ensuite Bath & Shower room. All the bedrooms are double rooms whilst the master bedroom is huge.  
Property is rented to a well known Company at AED 170K - 1 chq from 10th July 2019.
Please Call Abdulsalam to discuss & arrange a viewing: +971523005717
Email: Abs@Dacha-RE.Com
Office: www.dacha-re.com']
